newsitem.title: UK: Reuters extends rally, Capels repeat 'buy'.
newsitem.headline: Reuters extends rally, Capels repeat 'buy'.

text.p: Shares in global news and information group Reuters Holdings Plc extended their recovery on Friday as HSBC James Capel repeated its 'buy' recommendation on the stock, dealers said.
Reuters shares were 11.5p higher at 630p at 0920 GMT, building on Thursday's 20p gain.

Dealers said Capels had reiterated their 'buy' stance after interim results in line with expectations. Reuters pre-tax profit dipped three percent to 333 million stg in the first half of the year, dented by the strong pound.
Reuters shares, which have lost around a quarter of their value over the past nine months, rallied on Thursday when investment bank Lehman Brothers raised the stock from 'neutral' to 'outperform'.
Lehman's analyst Carlo Campomagnani set a price target of 700p on the stock.
